text: melum, nam (avarkalaip parttu)"ninkal unkalai vetti mayttuk kollunkal, allatu unkalutaiya vitukaliliruntu veliyerivitunkal" enru kattalaiyittiruppomanal, avarkalil cilarait tavira marravarkal avvaru ceytirukka mattarkal - avarkal tankalukku upatecam ceyyappattapati natantirupparkalanal, atu avarkalukku nanmaiyakavum, (avarkal nampikkaiyai) mikavum urutippatuttuvatakavum iruntirukkum
